response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. Given its significance, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $950,000. This price reflects my desire to ensure that the product finds a home with someone who appreciates its worth as much as I do. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
